```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```




```{r}



# Load af metaphlan data
metaphlan <- read_delim("/home/projects/cu_00014/people/albmol/speciale/metadata_overblik/data/metaphlan/MetaPhlAn_4.0.3_Combined_NonHuman_Subsampled_2500000_profile.txt", delim = "\t", skip=1, show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  filter_tax_species() %>% 
  select(clade_name, starts_with(c("PaPr", "PaOp", "PaNp"))) %>% 
  rename_with(~ sub("_.*$", "", .), starts_with(c("PaPr", "PaOp", "PaNp"))) 


```
